CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 7 The fundamental requirements for promising photovoltaic μmR - polymers include the following : ( a ) broad absorption extending to or surpassing 1 μm to absorb more sunlight ; ( b ) a high LUMO energy level to allow effective photoinduced charge transfer from the polymers to the acceptor in the BHJ device and at the same time , a low HOMO level to keep the open circuit voltage ( V OC ) as high as possible ; ( c ) high carrier mobility to ensure that effective charge carrier transport to the electrodes suppresses photocurrent loss ; and ( d ) good solubility and appropriate compatibility with fullerene derivatives to form high - quality films by solution processing.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| μmR - polymers |
| fullerene derivatives |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material Name" in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| μmR - polymers |
| fullerene derivatives |

I removed "BHJ device" and "solution processing" from the table as they do not clearly refer to material names.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 7 The fundamental requirements for promising photovoltaic μmR - polymers include the following : ( a ) broad absorption extending to or surpassing 1 μm to absorb more sunlight ; ( b ) a high LUMO energy level to allow effective photoinduced charge transfer from the polymers to the acceptor in the BHJ device and at the same time , a low HOMO level to keep the open circuit voltage ( V OC ) as high as possible ; ( c ) high carrier mobility to ensure that effective charge carrier transport to the electrodes suppresses photocurrent loss ; and ( d ) good solubility and appropriate compatibility with fullerene derivatives to form high - quality films by solution processing.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Broad absorption |
| High LUMO energy level |
| Low HOMO level |
| High carrier mobility |
| Good solubility |
| Appropriate compatibility with fullerene derivatives |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Broad absorption |
| High LUMO energy level |
| Low HOMO level |
| High carrier mobility |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* "good solubility"
* "appropriate compatibility with fullerene derivatives"

These entities are not directly related to the physical properties of the material, but rather to its ability to be processed and interact with other materials in a device.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 7 The fundamental requirements for promising photovoltaic μmR - polymers include the following : ( a ) broad absorption extending to or surpassing 1 μm to absorb more sunlight ; ( b ) a high LUMO energy level to allow effective photoinduced charge transfer from the polymers to the acceptor in the BHJ device and at the same time , a low HOMO level to keep the open circuit voltage ( V OC ) as high as possible ; ( c ) high carrier mobility to ensure that effective charge carrier transport to the electrodes suppresses photocurrent loss ; and ( d ) good solubility and appropriate compatibility with fullerene derivatives to form high - quality films by solution processing.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 1 μm | Broad absorption extending to or surpassing 1 μm to absorb more sunlight |
| High LUMO energy level | Allow effective photoinduced charge transfer from the polymers to the acceptor in the BHJ device and at the same time, a low HOMO level to keep the open circuit voltage (VOC) as high as possible |
| High carrier mobility | Ensure effective charge carrier transport to the electrodes suppresses photocurrent loss |
| Good solubility and appropriate compatibility with fullerene derivatives | Form high-quality films by solution processing |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 1 μm | Broad absorption extending to or surpassing 1 μm to absorb more sunlight |
| High LUMO energy level | Allow effective photoinduced charge transfer from the polymers to the acceptor in the BHJ device and at the same time, a low HOMO level to keep the open circuit voltage (VOC) as high as possible |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Value of material property":

* "good solubility and appropriate compatibility with fullerene derivatives" (this refers to the compatibility of the polymer with other materials, not a specific property value)
* "high carrier mobility" (this refers to the ability of charge carriers to move through the material, not a specific property value)

Therefore, the table above only includes the two property values mentioned in the paragraph: 1 μm and high LUMO energy level.
